00018 namespace BulletHell.Game.Library.Behavior
00019 {
00020     public class EvadingBehavior : Behavior
00021     {
00022         private float xDistance = 0; // positive = hero is left of parent
00023         private float yDistance = 0; // negative = hero is in front of parent
00024 
00025         public EvadingBehavior(EnemyPlaneObj parent)
00026             : base(parent)
00027         {
00028             behaviorState = BehaviorState.Evade;
00029         }
00030 
00031         public override Behavior clone(EnemyPlaneObj newParent)
00032         {
00033             return new EvadingBehavior(newParent);
00034         }
00035 
00036         internal override void Update(Map map, GameTime gameTime)
00037         {
00038             xDistance = (parent.X - map.hero.X);
00039             yDistance = (parent.Y - map.hero.Y);
00040 
00041             /* Evades from the target */
00042             parent.move((xDistance <= 0) ? -1 : 1, (yDistance <= 0) ? -1 : 1, parent.velocity);
00043         }
00044     }
00045 }
